Title: Zune Lyrics
Description: Zune Lyrics is a plugin for Zune Software which automatically fetches lyrics of the song currently being played in Zune Software from lyricsplugin.com. Built using WPF, it uses the registry data stored by Zune - Now Playing to detect the current song.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Zune Lyrics is a plugin for Zune Software which automatically fetches lyrics of the song currently being played in Zune Software from lyricsplugin.com. Built using WPF, it uses the registry data stored by Zune - Now Playing to detect the current song.
You can find Zune - Now Playing at http://znp.codeplex.com

Quick Start:
Download the zip file and run Setup.exe. Follow the instructions to install Zune Lyrics on your system. Run Zune Lyrics from your desktop or Programs Menu
  • To refresh the lyrics, use F5

Note: Zune Lyrics takes proxy settings from Internet Explorer. So please make sure you have correct settings filled in there. It doesn't support proxies with authentication yet.
